subtitles:
44348 47628 People once believed
that when someone dies...

47704 51828 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

51905 55108 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

55185 60220 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

60306 63222 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

63308 68103 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
111902 115748 There's a piece of glass.

120141 124466 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124543 127659 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131102 134900 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

134986 137144 All right, guys,
let's do it.

137221 140300 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

141748 144462 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144548 149228 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

152067 155261 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155347 159941 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

160027 162223 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162262 165024 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

165100 167584 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

167661 170979 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

171066 173943 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
174019 175861 All right, clear out.

177184 179668 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

181826 185864 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

185940 188060 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

188146 191906 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

201506 204220 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

204306 208180 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

208228 211384 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
211422 213666 She's my friend.
213743 217502 Her and Eric.
217541 219708 You lied to her about Eric.

221386 224944 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

225021 227265 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

235945 241421 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
241545 244825 She's gonna be fine.

262942 266826 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

266902 269664 I used to think that was true
about everything...
269741 273980 families, friends, feelings.

274028 277826 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277864 282065 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

318748 321827 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342264 345505 You know, what this place
needs is a...
345582 347826 good natural catastrophe.

347903 352142 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

352180 355067 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
355144 357340 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357426 360342 Hey, hey, let me do it.

360428 364303 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364341 366700 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

366748 368628 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
368666 370987 Hey, all right.
371064 373346 Now we're talking.
373423 377940 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

378026 381700 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381786 385545 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

385622 387348 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

387425 390945 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
391021 394100 They make you fart big time.

400180 402779 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402866 405388 from all the crap
floating around in it.
406500 410106 I wish I could have seen that.
467946 472262 Fire it up! Yeah!

509779 513548 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

535587 538819 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T- bird, cop car, cop car.

545782 548266 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

554068 555900 - Damn it!
- What was that?

555986 558547 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
558623 561788 Mickey, call it in for me!

651861 654825 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

654901 659227 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
659303 661423 Place looks fine to me.
661461 664185 Let's redecorate.
666582 670582 "Abash, the devil stood...

670620 673219 and felt how awful
goodness is.

673305 677707 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely. "
It's pornography.
690299 692946 No, no, no, me first.

738788 741579 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

745300 748743 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

748820 750661 Look at that.
Look at that.

751947 756224 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

759744 761662 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
761700 764702 You sick fuck.

764740 768308 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
771425 775625 Look at that!
777745 779701 Pussies drink last, man.

780900 783221 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

784583 786980 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
787067 789148 This one is.

789224 792025 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

792102 796225 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

796302 800023 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

800100 803063 - Fire it up! - Fire
it up! - Fire it up!
803140 805825 Fire it up! Fire it up!
805902 808866 Here's your shooters.

808942 810822 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

844782 848148 - I love you.
- Say that again.
853586 856865 Restaurant.

861344 864384 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

871146 873620 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

967740 970186 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

970262 974108 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
974185 976419 Leather purse. Leather.
976506 980821 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

980908 985262 A blood stain
that's on here?

985348 987861 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

987947 990661 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
990747 993385 Right there for ya.
993462 997662 Decisions, decisions.
999139 1002179 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1002266 1005143 ... child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1005181 1007464 Close the gate
when you go out!

1007540 1010101 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1012662 1015941 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020468 1024745 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.

1125502 1128504 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1130988 1135064 Halloween ain't till manana.
1175343 1178623 Fuck, you murderer!

1178700 1181222 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1181299 1185222 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1185308 1188588 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188626 1191101 - You're out of your fucking mind...
- Listen!

1191187 1195819 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1195905 1200662 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1200701 1203060 Her name was Shelly.

1203146 1206023 You cut her.
You raped her.

1206100 1211662 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1220505 1225223 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1225300 1229740 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1234267 1236703 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1236780 1239340 We never miss.

1249506 1251501 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1256382 1261024 Victims.
Aren't we all?

1284741 1288903 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.

1295981 1298628 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1303184 1306348 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1307422 1309264 Give me some of that
over there!

1311422 1314980 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1315028 1319621 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319660 1323343 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323419 1327466 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1327505 1331427 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1360227 1363862 You're thinking
about the past.
1366068 1368465 Dad gave me this.
1368542 1372541 Fifth birthday.

1372628 1377106 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1390427 1392787 Is she asleep?
1398742 1400900 I think we broke her.
1404746 1406779 I love her eyes.

1425586 1428626 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1446464 1451787 I told you to stay out of here.

1451825 1455345 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1455422 1459306 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1459344 1461588 I don't have any dolls.
1461665 1464906 Get some food, huh?

1464945 1467822 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1473308 1476827 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police. "
1486427 1489544 Thirty, forty dollars.
1491222 1493582 Who the fuck is this now?

1493620 1497619 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1500343 1504026 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1511305 1515381 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1522746 1526947 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1526985 1530783 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door. "
1532663 1534868 What are you talking about?
1534945 1537544 You heard me rapping, right?

1537621 1541582 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1543903 1546741 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1548228 1550462 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1554548 1559468 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1559545 1561980 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1570104 1572261 You're not paying attention.

1577220 1582303 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1583866 1587184 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1589783 1593303 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1598386 1600304 Who's this sack of shit?

1600380 1603219 That's Tin Tin, one of
T- bird's little helpers.

1603305 1606221 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1606307 1608983 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1609060 1613059 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1613145 1617662 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617739 1619580 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1619667 1623263 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1624424 1626744 What the hell
do you call that?
1627742 1630226 I call it blood, detective.

1630302 1633947 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1633985 1636661 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643106 1645906 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1645983 1648505 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1648543 1651344 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1651421 1655621 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1655707 1660982 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664425 1666899 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1683107 1687145 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1710066 1712866 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1712943 1715906 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1715983 1718707 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1718784 1721306 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1721383 1723665 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1723742 1728623 T- birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1728700 1731587 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1731663 1735260 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1735346 1737983 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1738060 1740621 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1742222 1745464 Each one of these is a life...
1745541 1747948 a life you helped destroy.

1748025 1750547 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1750585 1754143 I'm not gonna kill you.

1754220 1758219 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1766505 1770543 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1772346 1776268 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1776345 1779826 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1779903 1781946 Is that gasoline I smell?

1803265 1806584 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1806660 1808866 One root beer.
1810784 1813422 I can't do anything.

1813508 1817785 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1824307 1829025 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1829064 1831979 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1832065 1835825 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1835901 1840860 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1840908 1844101 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1844140 1848340 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1848427 1851428 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1853222 1856262 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1856348 1860184 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1860261 1862822 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1862860 1867300 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1867348 1871981 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1872067 1876344 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1876421 1878742 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1878828 1883221 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1883307 1885781 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1885867 1889224 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1889301 1894422 - He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1894508 1898028 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1898105 1900426 Get away from there!

1900502 1903504 Cops!
Get outta here!
1911982 1916144 Oh, great, great.

1916221 1918705 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1918782 1920987 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1921064 1926665 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1926742 1930501 Little early
for Devil's Night.
1932026 1934625 You are very restless.

1934702 1937780 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1937867 1941943 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1952943 1955868 There are energies
aligning against you.

1955945 1958304 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

1976660 1980467 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1980544 1983622 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1983699 1985387 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1985464 1988024 You must be
awfully disappointed.

1988101 1991304 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1991343 1993548 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1993625 1998027 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1998066 2000540 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2000626 2003666 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2006227 2008701 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008788 2011463 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2011502 2014225 That's very reassuring.

2014264 2018148 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2018225 2022502 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2022588 2024343 Call it my need to know.
2056586 2059060 Let go, you creep!

2064028 2067184 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2068545 2070828 He couldn't have stopped.

2070905 2075019 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2075105 2078021 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2081982 2086547 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2087659 2091025 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2107262 2111664 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2111741 2115903 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2115980 2119259 Annie... look at that.

2119346 2123383 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments... "
2123460 2125426 What is this, a petition?

2125503 2128265 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2128342 2132264 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighborhood?

2132341 2137980 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2138066 2141461 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2141548 2145384 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2152107 2155703 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2157861 2162426 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2162464 2164862 Ah, I owe you one!

2193422 2197143 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2197220 2200739 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2224620 2227142 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2233059 2235581 Come here, bird.

2235668 2237663 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2237739 2239983 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2240022 2242544 Here, birdie, birdie.

2242582 2245460 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2247982 2251060 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2255865 2257745 What the fuck?

2263863 2268227 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2270423 2273185 Don't sweat it.

2274825 2277741 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285346 2289988 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2291906 2296624 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2296701 2300067 You need professional help.
2304345 2306867 He shoots! He scores!

2316582 2320140 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2320226 2322825 Stop me if you heard this one.

2322902 2325702 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2330900 2333547 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2333624 2337019 Don't you ever fucking die?
2337105 2339263 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2344548 2348940 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2351059 2354982 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2378219 2380147 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2383063 2385662 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2402704 2406425 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2417665 2421980 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2422067 2426622 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2436625 2441228 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2469779 2473308 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2473385 2475543 Now fill it up!
2476588 2479820 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2479906 2482467 I really need this.

2490705 2494503 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2494541 2497025 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2497102 2499461 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2499548 2502348 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2502425 2505100 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2508543 2511344 Hey, good night, Darla.
2513665 2517223 You stay put right there.
2524943 2528261 Get away, steamhead.

2558145 2563659 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2563707 2566345 - the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2566421 2569260 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2569346 2572185 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2572224 2574305 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2574381 2576424 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2576501 2581066 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2584020 2587386 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2591222 2593303 Good likeness.

2593380 2596948 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2597024 2599182 You still have your hat on.
2602942 2604946 I gotta sit down.
2614383 2618507 are you some kind of... ghost?

2627742 2632106 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2634024 2637947 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2638023 2640987 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2641064 2645465 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2645542 2648064 Come on. Read the file.

2648141 2652303 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2652380 2655468 Her body finally just gave it up.

2655507 2659228 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2668703 2670544 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2682743 2685908 I saw her
through your eyes.

2685985 2687980 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2688066 2693302 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2693379 2697944 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2697983 2700821 Give me something
I could work with.

2705463 2707861 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2707947 2711141 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2711227 2714545 would talk after
what happened to you?

2714622 2717700 I kept asking
questions and...

2717787 2720347 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2724183 2726063 This your wife?

2726140 2730427 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2735107 2738943 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2739020 2742386 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2742463 2745340 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2754585 2758862 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2763341 2766420 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2769901 2772500 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2775425 2781026 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2791662 2795028 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2795105 2798106 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2798183 2801108 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2801185 2804302 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2804340 2806786 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2806862 2811101 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2811188 2815983 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2816060 2818428 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2818505 2820903 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2820979 2826264 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2826340 2828987 You ain't lost everything.

2829064 2833946 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2834022 2837465 Fair enough. Catch.

2840947 2843267 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2843344 2845262 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2845301 2848820 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2848907 2852704 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2852781 2856742 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2859427 2864386 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2864462 2867579 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister?

2867624 2870818 My father's daughter.
That's right.

2870819 2873705 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2873781 2875939 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2876025 2879382 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2879507 2882825 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2882902 2886143 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
2886220 2888387 Whatever the fuck that means.

2888426 2892061 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2893106 2895101 Want to relax
that thing now?

2895139 2899627 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2899704 2903905 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2903943 2906542 I ain't making all this up.

2906619 2910944 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2919182 2923987 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2933827 2936704 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2945623 2947819 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2950466 2955146 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2955223 2958982 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3020275 3022548 You lost or hungry?

3042515 3045114 I don't know how many times I
